message: I know of several sites that have very nice API's that work well with django projects (like Disqus & Postmarkapp).  What are your favorite?
Also, I guess it might be useful to also mention what problem they solve :)
I've found SimpleGeo's Python API to be really simple to use. I'm currently using Context to lookup things like the geometry of an address's zip code.
I really love that convore does http auth. Makes library support way easy.
Especially since python's urllib+cookies is notoriously crap.
@justinlilly http auth is okay under https :P
the only reason to use OAuth with https is if you don't trust 3rd party apps with the user's password
Right. I get the http auth & https thing. Just saying it makes things nice, to not have to deal with cookies.
@leah Why is that stupid? I wouldn't give my password to a 3rd party service without some pretty conclusive proof of the protections in place.
